Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI.controller

package it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI.controller

    it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI

  • Class
    Description
    ClientUpdateThread
    This class represents a thread that listens for updates from the game server and updates the TUI accordingly.
    CommandThread
    The CommandThread class handles user input commands and interacts with the server.
    RenderThread
     
    SharedUpdate
    The SharedUpdate class is a thread-safe utility for managing update notifications.
    TuiController
    The TuiController class handles the flow of the game using the TUI.
    View
    The View enum represents the different views that can be displayed in the TUI.
